items.sentence: Tom, Mary, John, Alice and I are all going to Boston.
Tom didn't speak any French the first time I met him.
We tried to make out the letters written on the wall.
She got it into her head that I was bad-mouthing her.
It is said that his father died in a foreign country.
If you work day and night, you will lose your health.
It would be nice if Tom could help me this afternoon.
I didn't know that Tom and John were Mary's brothers.
Tom said that Mary is going to go see John in Boston.
It's obvious Tom and Mary are more than just friends.
